about.title: About Me
about.description:
My name is Lucas Rinaldi and I have been working with technology since 2016.
Curious and passionate about challenges, I seek my professional and personal development by contributing to incredible people.

items.text: Responsible for Key Results (KR), ensuring the achievement of the company's strategic objectives.
Responsible for defining and implementing the front-end architecture, as well as developing the new component library.
Conducting code reviews and publishing versions using Azure DevOps.
Monitoring performance and analyzing APM (Application Performance Management) using Elastic Search.
Champion of the concept of componentization, promoting reusability and scalability in development.
Technical support for other squads, providing guidance on Angular and front-end development standards.
Continuous feedback and monitoring of team performance, aiming for improvement and professional growth.
Execution of additional Scrum rituals, ensuring adherence to agile methodologies within the team.
Responsible for the first implementations of Artificial Intelligence services in the company, promoting innovation and automation in processes.
Author of a 500% improvement in build time, adding hot reload to an internal company library using npmjs.
Responsible for the architecture and development of a component library in Angular, using the Angular style guide, applied through the BEM methodology for organization and scalability of SCSS styles.
Responsible for componentizing various routines and interfaces widely used across all modules of the company, ensuring standardization and reusability.

Responsible for conducting research and making integrations with external vendors, such as Google Cloud and Microsoft, achieving strategic advancements, such as the integration of online document editing with an already established storage infrastructure in Azure.
Responsible for defining and applying code standardization rules using tools like ESLint and Prettier, following best practices and reference documentation from Airbnb and Trivago.
Inspection and correction of the software improvement and bug queue using Kanban.
Development and maintenance of APIs consumed internally for web apps and mobiles.
Implementation of new features using Scrum.
Code review for the squad.
Contribution to the squad with VSCode configurations aimed at productivity.
Deployment in staging and production environments.
Migration and import of records from legacy modules to new modules.
Maintenance and development of migration and import tools.
Responsible for coordinating and monitoring employees in training.
Author of multiple tasks and workspaces for development in C# using VSCode.
Creating pages from prototypes in .psd and .xd provided by clients
Development of new features for existing/launch applications
Facelifts and general layout changes
Estimation and definition of delivery deadlines
Maintenance of the bug queue for maintained projects
Implementation and testing of metrics (Adobe Audience Manager, Facebook Pixel, Google Tag Manager)
Use of the Adobe package for image/video editing
Migration of the organization's digital products from the MVC model to Angular, using REST API (C#) and Scrum as an agile methodology
Maintenance of the bug queue for the company's legacy products using the Kanban methodology
Development and maintenance of internally consumed APIs offered as services
Creation and refactoring of unit tests using xUnit
Development of web projects such as e-commerce, institutional websites, portfolios, and general websites
Consulting and monitoring of advertising on Facebook and Google AdWords
Production, development, and artistic application focused on the web
Responsible for deployment and release of developed products
Web development based on prototypes using PhotoShop
Maintenance of SQL Server databases
Development and logical coding of projects in ASP.NET and C#
Refactoring and facelifts of maintained projects
Implementation of tests and refactoring of legacy code
Maintenance of hardware and software equipment used in the city hall premises
Optimization and better use of physical computational resources
On-site and remote technical support
Assistance in the installation of internal infrastructure
